mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mxsm_allocation (biz_code, max_id, step, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{alloc.bizCode}, #{alloc.maxId}, #{alloc.step}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE mxsm_allocation SET max_id = max_id + step * #{stepLength} WHERE biz_code = #{bizCode}
mapper.select: SELECT id, max_id as maxId, step FROM mxsm_allocation WHERE biz_code = #{bizCode} FOR UPDATE
